suite.name: Rpa Caisse

kw.name: Connect To Database
kw.doc: Loads the DB API 2.0 module given `dbapiModuleName` then uses it to connect to the database using `dbName`, `dbUsername`, and `dbPassword`.
kw.msg: Connecting using : psycopg2.connect(database=rpa_caisse_db, user=postgres, password=postgres, host=localhost, port=5432)

kw.name: Lire le fichier Excel
kw.doc: Lire le fichier excel et recuperer les données neccessaires

kw.name: Open Excel Document
kw.doc: Opens xlsx document file.

kw.name: Get Sheet
kw.doc: Returns a page from the current document.

kw.name: Read Excel Cell
kw.doc: Returns content of a cell.

kw.name: Close All Excel Documents
kw.doc: Closes all opened documents.

kw.name: Insertion dans la base de donnee
kw.doc: Insertion des données dans la base de donnée

kw.name: Catenate
kw.arg: rapport_journalier (nom_responsable, email_responsable, date, montant_carte_bancaire, montant_espece, montant_ticket_restaurant, montant_prelevement, montant_monnaie ) VALUES ('${nom_responsable}','${email_responsable}','${date}','${montant_carte_bancaire}','${montant_espece}','${montant_ticket_restaurant}','${montant_prelevement}','${montant_apport_monnaie}')
kw.doc: Catenates the given items together and returns the resulted string.
kw.msg: ${query} = INSERT INTO rapport_journalier (nom_responsable, email_responsable, date, montant_carte_bancaire, montant_espece, montant_ticket_restaurant, montant_prelevement, montant_monnaie ) VALUES ('Romeo BEYAR...

kw.name: Execute Sql String
kw.doc: Executes the sqlString as SQL commands. Useful to pass arguments to your sql. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.
kw.msg: Executing : Execute SQL String | INSERT INTO rapport_journalier (nom_responsable, email_responsable, date, montant_carte_bancaire, montant_espece, montant_ticket_restaurant, montant_prelevement, montant_monnaie ) VALUES ('Romeo BEYARA','romeo.beyara@eburtis.ci','2023-05-19 00:00:00','12000','5000','1000','14000','3000')

kw.name: Vérification des montants
kw.doc: Vérification du solde selon la regles "carte bancaire + espèces + ticket restaurant = prélèvement - apport monnaie".

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Disconnect From Database
kw.doc: Disconnects from the database.

suite.doc: Automatisation du processus d'insertion de donnée dans une base d'un fichier excel
